verses.verse: And <WG2532> I looked <WG1492>, and <WG2532>, lo <WG2400>, a Lamb <WG721> stood <WG2476> on <WG1909> the mount <WG3735> Sion <WG4622>, and <WG2532> with <WG3326> him <WG846> an hundred <WG1540> forty <WG5062> and four <WG5064> thousand <WG5505>, having <WG2192> his <WG846> Father's <WG3962> name <WG3686> written <WG1125> in <WG1909> their <WG846> foreheads <WG3359>.

And <WG2532> I heard <WG191> a voice <WG5456> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>, as <WG5613> the voice <WG5456> of many <WG4183> waters <WG5204>, and <WG2532> as <WG5613> the voice <WG5456> of a great <WG3173> thunder <WG1027>: and <WG2532> I heard <WG191> the voice <WG5456> of harpers <WG2790> harping <WG2789> with <WG1722> their <WG846> harps <WG2788>:

And <WG2532> they sung <WG103> as it were <WG5613> a new <WG2537> song <WG5603> before <WG1799> the throne <WG2362>, and <WG2532> before <WG1799> the four <WG5064> beasts <WG2226>, and <WG2532> the elders <WG4245>: and <WG2532> no man <WG3762> could <WG1410> learn <WG3129> that song <WG5603> but <WG1508> the hundred <WG1540> and forty <WG5062> and four <WG5064> thousand <WG5505>, which <WG3588> were redeemed <WG59> from <WG575> the earth <WG1093>.

These <WG3778> are they <WG1526> which <WG3739> were <WG3435> not <WG3756> defiled <WG3435> with <WG3326> women <WG1135>; for <WG1063> they are <WG1526> virgins <WG3933>. These <WG3778> are they <WG1526> which <WG3588> follow <WG190> the Lamb <WG721> whithersoever <WG3699> <WG302> he goeth <WG5217>. These <WG3778> were redeemed <WG59> from <WG575> among men <WG444>, being the firstfruits <WG536> unto God <WG2316> and <WG2532> to the Lamb <WG721>.

And <WG2532> in <WG1722> their <WG846> mouth <WG4750> was found <WG2147> no <WG3756> guile <WG1388>: for <WG1063> they are <WG1526> without fault <WG299> before <WG1799> the throne <WG2362> of God <WG2316>.

And <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> another <WG243> angel <WG32> fly <WG4072> in <WG1722> the midst of heaven <WG3321>, having <WG2192> the everlasting <WG166> gospel <WG2098> to preach <WG2097> unto them that dwell <WG2730> on <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>, and <WG2532> to every <WG3956> nation <WG1484>, and <WG2532> kindred <WG5443>, and <WG2532> tongue <WG1100>, and <WG2532> people <WG2992>,

Saying <WG3004> with <WG1722> a loud <WG3173> voice <WG5456>, Fear <WG5399> God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> give <WG1325> glory <WG1391> to him <WG846>; for <WG3754> the hour <WG5610> of his <WG846> judgment <WG2920> is come <WG2064>: and <WG2532> worship <WG4352> him that made <WG4160> heaven <WG3772>, and <WG2532> earth <WG1093>, and <WG2532> the sea <WG2281>, and <WG2532> the fountains <WG4077> of waters <WG5204>.

And <WG2532> there followed <WG190> another <WG243> angel <WG32>, saying <WG3004>, Babylon <WG897> is fallen <WG4098>, is fallen <WG4098>, that great <WG3173> city <WG4172>, because <WG3754> she made <WG4222> all <WG3956> nations <WG1484> drink <WG4222> of <WG1537> the wine <WG3631> of the wrath <WG2372> of her <WG846> fornication <WG4202>.

And <WG2532> the third <WG5154> angel <WG32> followed <WG190> them <WG846>, saying <WG3004> with <WG1722> a loud <WG3173> voice <WG5456>, If any man <WG1536> worship <WG4352> the beast <WG2342> and <WG2532> his <WG846> image <WG1504>, and <WG2532> receive <WG2983> his mark <WG5480> in <WG1909> his <WG846> forehead <WG3359>, or <WG2228> in <WG1909> his <WG846> hand <WG5495>,

The same <WG846> <WG2532> shall drink <WG4095> of <WG1537> the wine <WG3631> of the wrath <WG2372> of God <WG2316>, which <WG3588> is poured out <WG2767> without mixture <WG194> into <WG1722> the cup <WG4221> of his <WG846> indignation <WG3709>; and <WG2532> he shall be tormented <WG928> with <WG1722> fire <WG4442> and <WG2532> brimstone <WG2303> in the presence <WG1799> of the holy <WG40> angels <WG32>, and <WG2532> in the presence <WG1799> of the Lamb <WG721>:

And <WG2532> the smoke <WG2586> of their <WG846> torment <WG929> ascendeth up <WG305> for <WG1519> ever <WG165> and ever <WG165>: and <WG2532> they have <WG2192> no <WG3756> rest <WG372> day <WG2250> nor <WG2532> night <WG3571>, who <WG3588> worship <WG4352> the beast <WG2342> and <WG2532> his <WG846> image <WG1504>, and <WG2532> whosoever <WG1536> receiveth <WG2983> the mark <WG5480> of his <WG846> name <WG3686>.

Here <WG5602> is <WG2076> the patience <WG5281> of the saints <WG40>: here <WG5602> are they that keep <WG5083> the commandments <WG1785> of God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> the faith <WG4102> of Jesus <WG2424>.

And <WG2532> I heard <WG191> a voice <WG5456> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> saying <WG3004> unto me <WG3427>, Write <WG1125>, Blessed <WG3107> are the dead <WG3498> which <WG3588> die <WG599> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962> from henceforth <WG534>: Yea <WG3483>, saith <WG3004> the Spirit <WG4151>, that <WG2443> they may rest <WG373> from <WG1537> their <WG846> labours <WG2873>; and <WG1161> their <WG846> works <WG2041> do follow <WG190> <WG3326> them <WG846>.

And <WG2532> I looked <WG1492>, and <WG2532> behold <WG2400> a white <WG3022> cloud <WG3507>, and <WG2532> upon <WG1909> the cloud <WG3507> one sat <WG2521> like <WG3664> unto the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444>, having <WG2192> on <WG1909> his <WG846> head <WG2776> a golden <WG5552> crown <WG4735>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> his <WG846> hand <WG5495> a sharp <WG3691> sickle <WG1407>.

And <WG2532> another <WG243> angel <WG32> came <WG1831> out of <WG1537> the temple <WG3485>, crying <WG2896> with <WG1722> a loud <WG3173> voice <WG5456> to him that sat <WG2521> on <WG1909> the cloud <WG3507>, Thrust in <WG3992> thy <WG4675> sickle <WG1407>, and <WG2532> reap <WG2325>: for <WG3754> the time <WG5610> is come <WG2064> for thee <WG4671> to reap <WG2325>; for <WG3754> the harvest <WG2326> of the earth <WG1093> is ripe <WG3583>.
And <WG2532> he that sat <WG2521> on <WG1909> the cloud <WG3507> thrust in <WG906> his <WG846> sickle <WG1407> on <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>; and <WG2532> the earth <WG1093> was reaped <WG2325>.

And <WG2532> another <WG243> angel <WG32> came <WG1831> out of <WG1537> the temple <WG3485> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>, he <WG846> also <WG2532> having <WG2192> a sharp <WG3691> sickle <WG1407>.

And <WG2532> another <WG243> angel <WG32> came <WG1831> out <WG1537> from the altar <WG2379>, which had <WG2192> power <WG1849> over <WG1909> fire <WG4442>; and <WG2532> cried <WG5455> with a loud <WG3173> cry <WG2906> to him that had <WG2192> the sharp <WG3691> sickle <WG1407>, saying <WG3004>, Thrust in <WG3992> thy <WG4675> sharp <WG3691> sickle <WG1407>, and <WG2532> gather <WG5166> the clusters <WG1009> of the vine <WG288> of the earth <WG1093>; for <WG3754> her <WG846> grapes <WG4718> are fully ripe <WG187>.

And <WG2532> the angel <WG32> thrust in <WG906> his <WG846> sickle <WG1407> into <WG1519> the earth <WG1093>, and <WG2532> gathered <WG5166> the vine <WG288> of the earth <WG1093>, and <WG2532> cast <WG906> it into <WG1519> the great <WG3173> winepress <WG3025> of the wrath <WG2372> of God <WG2316>.

And <WG2532> the winepress <WG3025> was trodden <WG3961> without <WG1854> the city <WG4172>, and <WG2532> blood <WG129> came <WG1831> out of <WG1537> the winepress <WG3025>, even unto <WG891> the horse <WG2462> bridles <WG5469>, by the space of <WG575> a thousand <WG5507> and six hundred <WG1812> furlongs <WG4712>.
